timeline.bodyText:
This will break other testcases and limit the configurability within the DTO.
What if I don't want to use the DEFAULT_SDX_BLUEPRINT for my InternalSdxDto?
In a builder, for e.g. withStackRequets you should only change the object in the parameter.
It's also quite strange to have such a method where we pass both of these other testDto's
I've already did a similar refactor for this:

  
    
      cloudbreak/integration-test/src/main/java/com/sequenceiq/it/cloudbreak/dto/sdx/SdxInternalTestDto.java
    
    
         Line 89
      in
      60cb349
    
    
    
    

        
          
           .withLightDutySettings()
